job.title: Senior Software Test Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: <strong>Job Posting Title<br><br></strong>Senior Software Test Engineer<br><br><strong>Summary<br><br></strong>We are looking for a Sr. Software Test Engineer with at least 5 years’ experience in software testing to join our team, which is responsible for cutting-edge technology supporting Aristocrat's gaming platforms and Game Development Kits, which are used in casinos and venues around the world.<br>The Sr. Software Test Engineer will work closely with a team of Development and Test Engineers to plan, perform, and guide quality assurance activities that ensure the delivery of a high-quality gaming experience. This involves testing and reporting defects, reviewing defects reported internally and externally, assisting with a post-testing review for all releases, and maintaining the accuracy of all test documentation. Furthermore, the Sr. Software Test Engineer will mentor new and junior Software Test Engineers and foster a strong relationship with key stakeholders and business partners.<br><br><strong>What You'll Do<br><br></strong><ul><li>As a Senior Software Test Engineer, you will be responsible for owning quality assurance on our gaming platform.</li><li>You will provide technical assessments on features and identify scope of work and dependencies to meet test requirements.</li><li>You will design, implement, and maintain test plans, test cases, and test configurations, as well as provide hands-on hardware configuration and test execution.</li><li>You will provide technical guidance in identifying automation targets and developing white box test scenarios.</li><li>You will participate in design reviews and recommend improvements.</li><li>You will work with cross functional stakeholders to ensure we deliver a high-quality gaming experience.</li><li>You will promote established processes and seek opportunities to streamline and improve both our technologies and our processes.</li><li>All other duties as assigned.<br><br></li></ul><strong>What We're Looking For<br><br></strong><ul><li>Excellent software testing skills with a strong understanding of software testing methodology.</li><li>5+ years of experience testing embedded software, SDK or commercial software product releases.</li><li>Experience working with defect tracking and test management tools such as JIRA/Zephyr.</li><li>Prior experience in the gaming industry is desirable.</li><li>Strong knowledge of any scripting language (e.g., python) is desirable.</li><li>Good verbal and written communication skills to effectively interact with global stakeholders.</li><li>Software debugging and troubleshooting skills using industry standard tools.</li><li>Ability to analyze information and use logic to perform task efficiently, within deadlines.</li><li>Possesses good problem-solving skills to address work-related issues and problems.</li><li>Experience with Agile Scrum methodologies is desirable.</li><li>B.S. in Computer Science or equivalent is highly desirable.<br><br></li></ul><strong>Why Aristocrat?<br><br></strong><ul><li>World Leader in Gaming Entertainment</li><li>Robust benefits package</li><li>Global career opportunities<br><br></li></ul><strong>Our Values<br><br></strong><ul><li>All about the Player</li><li>Talent Unleashed</li><li>Collective Brilliance</li><li>Good Business Good Citizen<br><br></li></ul>The US based roles may require registration with the Nevada Gaming Control Board (NGCB) and/or other gaming jurisdictions in which we operate.
